lead_paragraph: A juice bar, a breakfast spot and a profusion of Italian foods like cured meat, cheese, pasta and gelato will be found downtown.

headline.print_headline: Eataly Adds Its Footprint to Downtown
headline.main: Eataly Expands in Manhattan to World Trade Center

snippet: A juice bar, a breakfast spot and a profusion of Italian foods like cured meat, cheese, pasta and gelato will be found downtown....
abstract: Italian supermarket chain Eataly says it will open second Manhattan store in Westfield World Trade Center complex; new offerings at latest marketplace include juice and breakfast bar, and restaurant Osteria della Pace specializing in southern Italian fare.
